Title: Relates to demonstration programs imposing monetary liability on the owner of a vehicle for failure of an operator thereof to comply with certain posted maximum speed limits in the town of Yorktown
Summary: Authorizes the town of Yorktown, Westchester county, shall have the ability to install and operate photo speed violation monitoring systems within construction or maintenance work areas that fall within the border or jurisdiction of such municipality; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-e, V & T L; amd ยง371-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to owner liability for failure of operator to comply with certain posted maximum speed limits in the town of Yorktown, Westchester county; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to making technical corrections
